attributes.action: Stop MP’s pay until they agree a deal or deliver brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit has not been delivered because the government has not had its intentions on leaving. Having a shutdown for Easter whist we have bigger issues at stake
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop all of the MP’s salary’s until they they all can come to an agreement on brexit. 

The nation voted they agreed to leave by a selected date. This has not happened so I propose that we as a nation stop there pay due to incompetence.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

There's already a petition about stopping or limiting Parliamentary recesses until Brexit is resolved, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256950
